alert.note: Alert for Eastern Lolo National Forest, Welcome Creek And Scapegoat Wildernesses; Salish and Kootenai Indian Reservation; Western Lolo National Forest (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 03 at 6:49AM MDT until September 04 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... * Affected area: Fire Zone 106 (West Lolo). Fire Zone 107 (Flathead Reservation). Fire Zone 108 (East Lolo). * Impacts: The combination of gusty winds, low humidity, and an unstable atmosphere will result in critical fire weather conditions this afternoon and evening. Isolated thunderstorms are possible this afternoon and evening, which could contribute to new fire starts. Thunderstorms will be capable of gusty and erratic outflows. * Winds: Southwest to west winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 35 mph. * Minimum humidities: 9 to 15 percent. * Haines: 6 High. &&

area.areaDesc: Eastern Lolo National Forest, Welcome Creek And Scapegoat Wildernesses; Salish and Kootenai Indian Reservation; Western Lolo National Forest
